info.description:
Like the title saids fanfiction of undertale.

Here's some rules to follow:

1. No Death

2. No toilet stuff

3. No trash stuff

4. No bad words

5. Have fun


If these rules are broken then Sans will come to your house and give you a BAD TIME.
